Html:
I am using HAP 1.4.9 via NuGet in a current Visual Studio project. I downloaded the source from CodePlex but it is not the same version I am running.

I'd like to get the 1.4.9 source. Is it still public?
1.4.9 posted to SVN. The only real update was a fix to the PCL build in the Nuget package. There were no code changes

Do you mean the current version under "1.4.0" on CodePlex actually contains the same source as "1.4.9" from NuGet?

In that case can I submit updated code to the repository here?

There is an ordering bug in HtmlNode.RemoveChild() that I have a fix for.

Sorry about my ignorance; I am a noob.
The latest source is available here http://htmlagilitypack.codeplex.com/SourceControl/latest .
